p:
The structural superposition of the hepatitis C virus polymerase NS5B bound to Sofosbuvir [PDB ID: 4WTG
13 ] with the SARS-coronavirus nsp12 [PDB ID: 6NUR
7 ] was performed in Chimera 1.13
25 using the MatchMaker
26 algorithm with default parameters. The tertiary structures were edited and depicted with Chimera 1.13
25 .
